propositions.text: 走过路过，路过，又是一个，匆匆忙忙的，我。
只是，我，不知道，从何说起。
走在路上，总是，想寻找一片，属于自己的，天空。
生活，总是，会有，一些，不可思议，的，惊喜，它，是，上天，给予，我的，最大的，幸运。
海边，落日，映照，海边，落日。
曾经，有过，一段，青春，回忆，那段，回忆，伴随，着，我，走过，一段，美好的，时光。
即使，岁月，流逝，即使，时光，荏苒，我，依然，记得，那段，美好的，时光。
海边，落日，映照，海边，落日。
天空，湛蓝，映照，天空，湛蓝。
匆匆，那年，我们，一起，走过，青春。
那段，时光，如同，一首，歌曲，在，我，心中，回荡。

concepts.name: 我
concepts.context: Implies the narrator or a general sense of self.

concepts.name: 走过
concepts.context: Appears in titles and descriptions, indicating movement or passage of time.

concepts.name: 路过
concepts.context: Related to '走过', indicating passing by.

concepts.name: 匆匆
concepts.context: Describes a sense of haste or the rapid passage of time, especially in relation to '那年'.

concepts.name: 天空
concepts.context: Represents a desire for freedom or a personal space.

concepts.name: 生活
concepts.context: Refers to the general experience of existence.

concepts.name: 惊喜
concepts.context: An unexpected positive event.

concepts.name: 上天
concepts.context: Implies a higher power or destiny.

concepts.name: 幸运
concepts.context: A positive outcome or fortunate circumstance.

concepts.name: 夏天
concepts.context: A specific season, likely associated with memories.

concepts.name: 海边
concepts.context: A setting for reflection and observation.

concepts.name: 落日
concepts.context: A visual element associated with beauty and transition.

concepts.name: 映照
concepts.context: Describes how light or emotions are reflected.

concepts.name: 青春
concepts.context: A period of youth and memories.

concepts.name: 回忆
concepts.context: Past experiences.

concepts.name: 时光

concepts.name: 美好
concepts.context: Positive quality.

concepts.name: 岁月
concepts.context: A long period of time.

concepts.name: 流逝
concepts.context: The process of time passing.

concepts.name: 荏苒
concepts.context: Similar to '流逝', describes the swift passage of time.

concepts.name: 依然
concepts.context: Despite the passage of time, something remains.

concepts.name: 湛蓝
concepts.context: Describes the color of the sky, implying clarity or vastness.

concepts.name: 那年
concepts.context: Refers to a specific past year, associated with shared experiences.

concepts.name: 我们
concepts.context: Implies a shared experience or relationship.

concepts.name: 歌曲
concepts.context: A metaphor for memories that resonate.

concepts.name: 心中
concepts.context: Refers to internal feelings or thoughts.

concepts.name: 回荡
concepts.context: Describes something lingering or resonating.

hierarchy.structure: The document has a main title and then numbered sections that repeatedly feature '飞鸟集' and '匆匆那年', interspersed with '走过路过'. The sections '飞鸟集' and '匆匆那年' appear to have a recurring thematic structure within them. The initial section '走过路过' provides a more introspective opening.
